description: My place is close to Peter Luger Steak House and  Baby's All Right. You’ll love the apartment because we have a comfy queen bed, large kitchen, living room with Apple TV, and an open backyard you can use with a picnic table and christmas lights. It is also super convenient. The apartment is right down the street from the JMZ Marcy stop and right next to the Williamsburg bridge. Only a stop away from the city (5 minutes). My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families.
name: Cute 1 bedroom in Williamsburg with Backyard
review: The host canceled this reservation 85 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
